title: Starlight Banner on the Red Dust
prompt: (Masterpiece), (high-quality illustration), 9:16 portrait orientation, a lone astronaut kneeling on a vast red alien planetary surface, planting a futuristic flag. The astronaut wears a detailed, white and cyan advanced sci-fi suit. The flag is dark blue, emblazoned with a bright cosmic star and galaxy pattern, fluttering dynamically. Dust and red particulate matter swirl near the ground. In the dark background, a massive, cratered brown-orange planet or moon looms, with shooting stars streaking across the deep black sky. Modern Anime style, cinematic lighting, strong contrast, volumetric atmosphere, detailed spacesuit armor.
